summary: Have you ever loved a weak bow so much that you wanted it to be powerful? This babe 1 shots Alduin(jk).
descriptionHtml:
[color=green][size=3][center]Pretty much every game I played have the best shaped weapon with the worst stats. But I fixed it for you.[/center][/size][/color]  
  
[center][size=6]INSTALLING[/size][/center]  
  
[color=green][size=3][center]Simply drag the .esp to your data folder and then enable the .esp. To get the bow, open the console and type ''player.additem 6200d63 1'' or craft it.[/center][/size][/color]  
  
Note: This is not a replace of the default bow. This mod adds an other long bow with higher damage value.
I'm open to requests.
author: ProtologolusX
